tweets.text:
‚ö†Ô∏è The Lea is among the most polluted rivers in London

Swimming there risks infection and diarrhoea, with BBQs and litter causing damage to wildlife, including kingfisher and owl nests

We recently wrote to @EnvAgency to request an update on work to tackle pollution in the river https://t.co/JMMo4ca5Cn

Y'day, @metecoban92, @chrismylesk & I wrote to @EnvAgency demanding action to clean up River Lea & associated waterways. It builds on letter @jonburkeUK & I sent before.
It's unacceptable residents, wildlife & visitors have to put up with this.
Thanks to those who got in touch. https://t.co/cISAOKNhoP

@rsmithsoil @SoilsAlliance @EnvAgencySW Deep unvaried unstructured destoned soils, high value winter harvested veg based on high field rents mean little room for best practice, and that can happen anywhere but more risky where rainfall is always higher
@RossCherrington @SoilsAlliance @EnvAgencySW Second video perhaps more typical in SW?

@HumberBizEd @Invest_ER @marketinghumber @Wykeland @hhchamber @AmazonUK @amazon Dear @HumberBizEd You have not mentioned the two villages this destroys and wildlife habitat there. Also planning approval has not been confirmed quite yet so your fanfare is premature.

That includes over 400 homes in Croston #Lancashire thanks to a flood storage basin on the River Yarrow... https://t.co/U6QZpiFxno

#TeamEA have been out today using new equipment to fight #WasteCrime

urls.description: Free preventing plastic pollution virtual workshop for your business, with insights, tips, case studies and round table discussions. Monday 19th April, 10am ‚Äì 12pm BST Are you a business that produces or uses plastics? Or a business that has plastics within your supply chain? Co-hosted by the Environment Agency, Greentech South and the Hampshire and [‚Ä¶]

@SianieRoo @SimonTagg @NewsNBC @MPGeorgeEustice @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Nor me, I should be paying same rates as a garage with no windows, not home with garden & Windows we can ever use, who wants to sit in stinking garden home to landfill rats, if the stink doesn't get you the rats will, don't even dare leave a chair outside,or ever have a door open

I am very sorry to let you know of Peter Ainsworth‚Äôs passing. He has been a wonderful support to me and @TheCCT over the past five years. I will really miss his wisdom and his sense of fun. @Heritage_NGOs he was a real heritage hero! https://t.co/K8Ikv3IEvv
